attributes.action: Stop deporting British born children to their parents's countries of origin.
attributes.additional_details:
I have helplessly watched and read stories on how British born offenders are deported to countries where their parents came from.
As a mother to two children including a boy,I feel I should make my voice heard about this very disturbing law that gives the home office powers to deport people born here to countries where they have no connection or attachment in terms of everything ,namey; culture,language,diet,family,friends ,memories or anything positive at all.It is worse than a death sentence.
attributes.background:
I'm calling upon the law and goverment policy makers to change the law on deporting offenders who have immigrant parents to countries where their parents come from.
I'm asking the givernment to review this law as a matter of urgency and stop the deportation of British born offenders.
